activities: Strevus receives personal data from its customers in the European Union and Switzerland in connection with and in furtherance of the services Strevus provides to its customers. In addition, Strevus may store personal data of its customers or business partners in the European Union and Switzerland. In certain circumstances, Strevus acts solely as an agent processing personal data under the direction of its customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: This Safe Harbor Framework covers the collection, use, retention, and disclosure in the U.S. of personal data in connection with and in furtherance of the services Strevus provides to its customers, as well as personal data of Strevus's customers or business partners, transferred from countries in the EU or Switzerland to Strevus in the U.S.
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
